articles.author: Drake Riggs
articles.title: UFC Perth results: Carlos Ulberg destroys Dominick Reyes with ferocious KO, punches likely title shot ticket - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Ulberg didn't waste any time putting a stamp on his first UFC main event Saturday night at the RAC Arena in Perth, Australia.
articles.content: Carlos Ulberg didn't waste any time putting a stamp on his first UFC main event against Dominick Reyes on Saturday night at the RAC Arena in Perth, Australia. The surging Kiwi contender extended his … [+3585 chars]
